languages.text: {n}Кибелла грустно качает головой.{/n} "Я не верю тебе, Домин. Ты выдаешь за знание надежду".
{n}Kibellah shakes her head forlornly.{/n} "I do not believe you, Domin. Your asserted knowledge is just a veiled hope."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла грустно качает головой.{/n} "Я не верю тебе, Домин. Ты выдаешь за знание надежду".

{n}Kibellah shakes her head forlornly.{/n} "I do not believe you, Domin. Your asserted knowledge is just a veiled hope."
{n}One of the figures bares her teeth in a bitter laugh.{/n} "The real Kibellah knew nothing of the true horror that is the xenos!"
{n}Kibellah shakes her head forlornly.{/n} "I do not believe you, Domin. Your asserted knowledge is just a veiled hope."
{n}Kibellah shakes her head forlornly.{/n} "I do not believe you, Domin. Your asserted knowledge is just a veiled hope."
{n}Kibellah shakes her head forlornly.{/n} "I do not believe you, Domin. Your asserted knowledge is just a veiled hope."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah sacude la cabeza con tristeza.{/n} «No puedo creer sus palabras, Domin. Su seguridad no es más que una esperanza velada».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head forlornly.{/n} "I do not believe you, Domin. Your asserted knowledge is just a veiled hope."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah sacude la cabeza con tristeza.{/n} «No puedo creer sus palabras, Domin. Su seguridad no es más que una esperanza velada».

languages.text: {n}キベラは寂しげに首を振る。{/n}「いいえ、信じません、ドミン。主張されている知識は、ベールに包まれた希望にすぎません」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head forlornly.{/n} "I do not believe you, Domin. Your asserted knowledge is just a veiled hope."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは寂しげに首を振る。{/n}「いいえ、信じません、ドミン。主張されている知識は、ベールに包まれた希望にすぎません」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈绝望地摇着头。{/n}“我不相信你的话，秘者。你的断言不过是含混其辞的希望罢了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head forlornly.{/n} "I do not believe you, Domin. Your asserted knowledge is just a veiled hope."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈绝望地摇着头。{/n}“我不相信你的话，秘者。你的断言不过是含混其辞的希望罢了。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah schüttelt den Kopf.{/n}"Ich glaube Euch nicht, Domin. Euer angebliches Wissen ist nur eine verschleierte Hoffnung."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head forlornly.{/n} "I do not believe you, Domin. Your asserted knowledge is just a veiled hope."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah schüttelt den Kopf."Ich glaube Euch nicht, Domin. Euer angebliches Wissen ist nur eine verschleierte Hoffnung."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah secoue tristement la tête.{/n} « Je ne vous crois pas, Domin. Votre prétendue certitude n'est guère qu'un espoir déguisé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head forlornly.{/n} "I do not believe you, Domin. Your asserted knowledge is just a veiled hope."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah secoue tristement la tête.{/n} « Je ne vous crois pas, Domin. Votre prétendue certitude n'est guère qu'un espoir déguisé. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah ümitsizce başını sallıyor.{/n} "Sana inanmıyorum Domin. İddia ettiğin bilgi, üstü örtülü bir umut yalnızca."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah shakes her head forlornly.{/n} "I do not believe you, Domin. Your asserted knowledge is just a veiled hope."
